summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2547 for the improvement of the Alley in Block Seventeen (17) J. J. McGilvra's Second Addition, being the alley between Thirty-seventh Avenue North and Thirty-eighth Avenue North, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by grading, planking, and the construction of wooden curbs and gutters and providing for the necessary drainage, under Ordinance No. 29528, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds.
